General.Name: Hagag Group
General.Description: Hagag Group Real Estate Entrepreneurship Ltd engages in development, management, and marketing of real estate projects in Israel. The company develops residential towers, luxurious office towers, apartments, commercial buildings, and hotels. It also engages in the development, management, and implementation of urban renewal projects. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel.
General.Address: Ha'arba'a Towers (Southern Tower), Tel Aviv, Israel, 6473926
